casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Antonio BULLOCK 194A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2016 Jon H. Hunt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bullock, Michael Antonio. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of August 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 16th day of September 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
